CustomField.formula: if( CustomerEscalationTemperature__c = 'COLD', IMAGE('/resource/CustomerEscalationCOLD', "COLD", 25, 40), if( CustomerEscalationTemperature__c = 'HOT', IMAGE('/resource/CustomerEscalationHOT', "HOT", 25, 40),if( CustomerEscalationTemperature__c = 'WARM', IMAGE('/resource/CustomerEscalationWARM', "WARM", 25, 40),null)))
CustomField.label: Temperature
